ARABIC: فَلَا تَدْعُ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَتَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلْمُعَذَّبِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: So do not call on any other god along with Allah or you will be among those who will be punished.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So call on no other god but God, lest you are condemned to torment;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: So do not call any other god beside Allah lest you become of those who will be punished,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), do not worship anything besides God lest you suffer the punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Therefore do not worship another deity along with Allah, for you will be punished.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So, invoke not with Allah another god lest you should be among those who receive punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So call not upon another god with Allah, lest you be of those who are punished.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So call thou not upon another god with God, lest thou shouldst be one of those that are chastised.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Therefor invoke not with Allah another god, lest thou be one of the doomed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: So do not call on any deity besides God, lest you incur His punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: So call not thou unto anot her god along with Allah, lest thou be of the doomed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So do not invoke any god besides Allah, lest you should be among the punished.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So call not on any other god with Allah, or thou wilt be among those under the Penalty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So invoke not with Allah another ilah (god) lest you be among those who receive punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: So do not call upon another god with Allah, lest you should be one of those who are punished.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So do not pray to another god with God, else you will be of those tormented.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So do not invoke with Allah another deity and [thus] be among the punished.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:213] So do not invoke any other god with God, lest you be among the chastised — if you were to do what they call you to.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Therefore invoke not) worship not (with Allah another god) among the idols, (lest thou be one of the doomed) in the Fire.
